long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
PostIndexer allows you to take control of the way that you save, organize and share Facebook posts with your audience.

Through the PostIndexer extension you can create indexes for Facebook groups, pages or topics of your choice, and save posts under categories within them â€“ like a bookmark manager for Facebook posts. 

Once you have saved the posts, the way that you and others view them can be specifically tailored by you on the PostIndexer website. Posts can be organized and displayed in a number of different ways:

Category view: Show posts under categories to help your audience easily access posts on specific topics, job listings or items for sale. This is ideal if you run an informational group, advertise jobs, or use Facebook as a sales platform.

Calendar view: Display posts on a calendar under the days that you want your audience to interact with them. This is perfect if you run a course via your Facebook group or if you want to encourage daily activity in your group. This can apply to any niche, be it educational, fitness or other!

Post Date view: Make sure your audience sees all of your posts in date order. New posts will no longer get lost in a sea of comments on older posts.

Index view: Easily sort posts under their index names, just like you do with files and folders.

PostIndexer can be used on both an individual level and group level:

Use it on an individual level to help you save and manage the Facebook posts that you like, and never lose a post again.

Use it on a group level to save, organize and share Facebook posts in your own way and make sure they are seen by your audience. Maximize the exposure of posts saved within the indexes that you create and significantly boost the post reach. 

Every book needs an index, even Facebook, and that's why we created PostIndexer. We hope you enjoy using it!

Disclaimer: PostIndexer is not affiliated with Facebook in any way.
